item.title:
In the US, telephone area codes were introduced in 1947, when rotary phones were still popular. This meant that lower codes were easier to dial as they required less rotation for each digit
Consequently, prominent & highly populated cities like NY (212) and LA (213) were favored https://t.co/HWT83Vy8qm
